"complex_modifications": {

    },
    "rules": [
        {
            "description": "Press left_command alone produces F14",
            "manipulators": [
                {
                    "from": {
                        "key_code": "left_command",
                        "modifiers": { "optional": [ "any" ] }
                    },
                    "to": [ { "key_code": "left_command" } ],
